T02TD2544AE:14b-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti bi dhi mandala n'a ma /
T02TD2544AE:14b-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD2544AE:14b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2544AE:14b-5: bag chags skyon gyi dri ma'i tha ba la //
T02TD2544AE:14b-6: shes rab bdud rtsi'i char pa 'bebs mdzad pa'i //
T02TD2544AE:14b-7: aa ra pa tsa na la gus btud de //
T02TD2544AE:14b-8: byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad /
T02TD2544AE:14b-9: de la 'dir dus gsum cha mnyam pa bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byed par 'dod pas /
T02TD2544AE:14b-10: bla ma gsang sngags la mkhas pa /
T02TD2544AE:14b-11: theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas pas /
T02TD2544AE:14b-12: slob ma ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ma smin pa smin par bya ba'i phyir ri bo la sogs pa dgon pa'i gnas su mandala byas te /
T02TD2544AE:14b-13: stan bde ba la 'dug ste mchod pa bshams nas /
T02TD2544AE:14b-14: bdag nyid drag po chen po drag shul che ba bdud la sogs pa 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed par bsams la /
T02TD2544AE:14b-15: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i stobs dang ldan pas bgegs thams cad bskrad de /
T02TD2544AE:14b-16: srid pa'i ri bo'i bgegs thams cad bcom la mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po'i ri bos bskor te /
T02TD2544AE:14b-17: rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha tshogs su sprul te mchod pa chen po phul la bsam gtan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
T02TD2544AE:14b-18: nam mkha'i khams su yi ge'i phreng ba snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas la //
T02TD2544AE:14b-19: mkhas pa byang sems rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas 'grub par bya ba'i dang po'i sbyor ba dang /
T02TD2544AE:14b-20: de'i byin rlabs las dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs sprul pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog dang /
T02TD2544AE:15a-1: kyi don grub par bya ba'i phyir las rgyal mchog dang de rnams bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD2544AE:15a-2: de ltar lha nye bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor byar rung ba'i sa'i cho ga dang /
T02TD2544AE:15a-3: slob ma snod dang ldan pa la sdom pa phog la dkyil 'khor bris te rgyan rnams dgram ste /
T02TD2544AE:15a-4: lha dgod pa ni dbus su bcom ldan 'das byang sems rdo rje zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa /
T02TD2544AE:15a-5: rdo rje dang dol bu can /
T02TD2544AE:15a-6: mdun du rdo rje sems dpa'/
T02TD2544AE:15a-7: g-yas su rdo rje rin chen /
T02TD2544AE:15a-9: byang du rdo rje las rnams bri /
T02TD2544AE:15a-10: sgeg mo la sogs pa brgyad dang //
T02TD2544AE:15a-11: khyams rnams su bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02TD2544AE:15a-12: sgo rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa gzhag go //
T02TD2544AE:15a-13: dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma bcug la de la dbang rnams bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2544AE:15a-14: rigs kyi bu de las yon gyi mchog blangs te lha dang slob dpon la mchod nas dkyil 'khor la bzod par gsol nas gshegs par bya'o //
T02TD2544AE:15a-15: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bsdus la ci bde bar gnas par bya'o //
T02TD2544AE:15a-16: byang sems rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD2544AE:15a-17: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
T02TD2544AE:15a-18: srid pa'i dgon po las brgal nas //
T02TD2544AE:15a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' thob par shog / byang sems rdo rje dbugs dbyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
